content: Is the Payer Coverage Decision Exchange (PCDE) IG (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pcde/STU1/) tended to be used to meet the Payer-to-Payer CMS recommendations for January 1, 2022? Or is the PCDE IG intended to be used for Prior Authorization Support (January 1, 2023)? Thank you

PCDE is intended for a requirement that wasn't clearly reflected in the current final regulations. Da Vinci will be revisiting it in January and talking with CMS about their intentions, but there is no near-term regulatory requirement that would require it to be adopted.
